## Load PCA related packages

```{r import}
library(GauPro)

if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install(version = "3.14")
BiocManager::install(c("edgeR", "org.EcK12.eg.db"))

library(edgeR)
library(ggplot2)
library(org.EcK12.eg.db)

```
